documentation.text: @dev The active conditions for claiming tokens.
@dev The ID for the active claim condition.
@dev Map from a claim condition uid and account to supply claimed by account.
@dev Lets a contract admin set claim conditions.
@dev Checks a request to claim NFTs against the active claim condition's criteria.
@dev Returns the supply claimed by claimer for active conditionId.
@dev Exposes the ability to override the msg sender.
@dev Collects and distributes the primary sale value of NFTs being claimed.

getSupplyClaimedByWallet(address).details: Returns the supply claimed by claimer for active conditionId.

setClaimConditions((uint256,uint256,uint.details: Lets a contract admin set claim conditions.

verifyClaim(address,uint256,address,uint.details: Checks a request to claim NFTs against the active claim condition's criteria.

claimCondition.details: The active conditions for claiming tokens.

conditionId.details: The ID for the active claim condition.

supplyClaimedByWallet.details: Map from a claim condition uid and account to supply claimed by account.

ClaimConditionUpdated((uint256,uint256,u.notice: Emitted when the contract's claim conditions are updated.

TokensClaimed(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when tokens are claimed via `claim`.
